Player History
Signed as a free agent by Houston on 2/8/1966 to a 3-year deal worth $5,750,000 per year...
Injured on 7/19/1967 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (A) on 2/9/1969 to a 2-year deal worth $3,213,210 per year...
Injured on 9/6/1969 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 9/17/1969 with a Dislocated Finger, out for one week...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 9/9/1970...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1970...
Signed as a free agent by Baltimore on 2/1/1971 to a 3-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
Injured on 4/20/1971 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Injured on 7/17/1972 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
Released by Baltimore on 4/26/1973...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 4/26/1973 to a 1-year deal worth $368,000 per year...
Traded from Atlanta to Baltimore on 4/26/1973 (Going to ATL: C T. Scrub. Going to BAL: SS L. Cardenas)...
Drafted in 6th round, 114th overall pick, by Atlanta in 1975...
Injured on 8/22/1981 with a Swollen Ear, out for one week...
Injured on 5/30/1984 with a Inflamed Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
